name: this-weekend-franklin-jazz-festival
title: This Weekend: Franklin Jazz Festival
author: Morgan Levy
excerpt: The 19th annual Franklin Jazz Festival kicks off tomorrow in downtown Franklin (their website is slightly reminiscent of Jazzercise, but we guess that counts). From 5pm-10pm on Saturday and Sunday, enjoy “cool jazz, mouth-watering food and refreshing drinks” in the square, and help raise support for the Epilepsy Foundation Middle & West Tennessee. Admission is $5 per day.
